remarks: Part of proof of Lemma E in [Crawley] p. 114 top. ` G ` represents f_s(r).  Auxiliary lemma derived from ~ cdleme5 .  We show f_s(r) ` <_ ` p ` \/ ` q.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Nov-2012.)
statement:
cdleme4.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdleme4.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdleme4.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdleme4.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdleme4.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdleme4.u $e |- U = ( ( P .\/ Q ) ./\ W ) $.
cdleme4.f $e |- F = ( ( S .\/ U ) ./\ ( Q .\/ ( ( P .\/ S ) ./\ W ) ) ) $.
cdleme4.g $e |- G = ( ( P .\/ Q ) ./\ ( F .\/ ( ( R .\/ S ) ./\ W ) ) ) $.
cdleme4a $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ R e. A ) /\ S e. A ) -> G .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ) $.
